segments.text: Excuse me . Where can I buy some cigarettes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a shop on the ground floor . It sells both Chinese and foreign cigarettes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I also get some souvenirs there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . There is a counter selling all kinds of souvenirs
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , where is the men's room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is one at the end of the corridor .
segments.speaker: S2
